name: viirs_ntl_annual_v20_cf_cvg
title: VIIRS Nighttime Lights Cloud Free Coverage
description: Yearly VIIRS day night band cloud free coverage.
details: Annual VIIRS nighttime lights product Version 2. Binary layer indicating whether each pixel had at least one cloud free coverage. Can be used in combination with VIIRS Nighttime Light Average product to determine if sufficient coverage exists with boundary features.

extract_types_info.sum: count of pixels with at least one cloud free measurement within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: C. D. Elvidge, M. Zhizhin, T. Ghosh, F-C. Hsu, Annual time series of global VIIRS nighttime lights derived from monthly averages: 2012 to 2019, Remote Sensing
